title: DP Hour 3 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins Guest Hosting
itunes:title: DP Hour 3 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Ryan, filling in for Dan, explain what happened in Dallas between the Suns and Mavericks Sunday night, which included the ejection of a Mavs' fan for reportedly putting his hands on Chris Paul's family member.  Doug and Ryan react to the breaking news that Nikola Jokic will be announced as the NBA's MVP for the second straight year.  Doug and Ryan discuss the biggest upset in the history of the Kentucky Derby, and other upsets in sports history. 

#DougGottliebShow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
